typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as short,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'fsdvidmcorpeus2',
	folderPath: 'test-source',
	fileName: 'ProductCategory.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> ProductCategorycsvSource
ProductCategorycsvSource select(mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryId = ProductCategoryID,
		ProductCategoryName = Name,
		ProductCategoryDescription = Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectProductCategory
SelectProductCategory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'DatabaseTest',
	tableName: 'ProductCategory',
	input(
		ProductCategoryId as integer,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		ProductCategoryDescription as string
	)) ~> ProductCategorySink
